title: Diversity and functional assessment of indigenous culturable bacteria inhabiting fine-flavor cacao rhizosphere: Uncovering antagonistic potential against Moniliophthora roreri
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Jhusephin Sheshira Crisostomo-Panuera, Amira Susana del Valle Nieva, Manuel Alejandro Ix-Balam, Jorge Ronny Díaz-Valderrama, Eliana Alviarez-Gutierrez, Segundo Manuel Oliva-Cruz, Liz Marjory Cumpa-Velásquez
